title: Artichoke and Sun dried Tomato Chicken

content.eamr: ( ing-0 "4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )

content.text: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green peppers and onions
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green peppers and onions" )

content.text: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained and quartered
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained and quartered" )

content.text: 0) Season both sides of chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:gol ( ing-0 "both sides of chicken breasts"@10:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "salt"@45:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "pepper"@54:60 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large skillet"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium-high heat"@36:52 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place chicken in skillet; cook, turning once to brown each side.
3) Remove chicken from pan, and set aside.
4) Pour tomatoes into pan; cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly, and incorporating any brown bits from bottom of pan.
5) Stir in pesto and artichokes, and return chicken to pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pesto"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "artichokes"@21:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "return"@37:43 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@44:51 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "pan"@55:58 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cover, and reduce heat to medium.
7) Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "5 to 10 minutes"@14:29 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until chicken is cooked through"@34:65 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
